title: Chunky Guacamole from RED GOLD
directions: In a medium bowl mash the avocados with a fork until chunky.  Stir in remaining ingredients until well blended.  Serve at room temperature.
ingredients: 1 (15.5 ounce) can RED GOLD Petite Diced Tomatoes with Lime Juice & Cilantro
Salt and black pepper to taste
